content.original: This vehicle was adapted to combat from a civilian design, it lacks the basic shielding, dampening and silencing features standard on modern military vehicles.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle was adapted to combat from a civilian design, it lacks the basic shielding, dampening and silencing features standard on modern military vehicles.
content.content: 这辆车是根据民用设计改装的,它缺乏现代军用车辆的基本屏蔽、阻尼和消声功能.

content.original: This is Omni Vehicle, it can be externally mounted by Battle Armors
content.prevOriginal: This is Omni Vehicle, it can be externally mounted by Battle Armors
content.content: 这是泛用车辆,它可以在外部挂载战斗装甲

content.original: This vehicle has an open cargo area. It can be externally mounted by Battle Armor, even if they have to sit on crates.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle has an open cargo area. It can be externally mounted by Battle Armor, even if they have to sit on crates.
content.content: 这辆车有一个开放的货物区.它可以在外部挂载战斗装甲,尽管他们必须坐在板条箱上.

content.original: ''Pardon me for asking, sir, but what good are snub-fighters going to be against that?'' - Star Wars, Act 3, Scene 4
content.prevOriginal: ''Pardon me for asking, sir, but what good are snub-fighters going to be against that?'' - Star Wars, Act 3, Scene 4
content.content: 先生,请原谅我的提问,但是冷落战士们会有什么好处呢? - 星球大战,第3幕,场景4

content.original: This unit is so large it is easier to hit.
content.prevOriginal: This unit is so large it is easier to hit.
content.content: 该单位太大了,很容易被击中.

content.original: 25% lower chance to take a critical hit.
content.prevOriginal: 25% lower chance to take a critical hit.

content.original: This unit is extremely common and cheap. Replacement parts and maintenance supplies are plentiful.
content.prevOriginal: This unit is extremely common and cheap. Replacement parts and maintenance supplies are plentiful.
content.content: 这个单位是极其普通和便宜的.更换零件和维修用品充足.

content.original: This VTOL has good quality external bomb mounts, increasing the accuracy of weapons mounted on the Left and Right.
content.prevOriginal: This VTOL has good quality external bomb mounts, increasing the accuracy of weapons mounted on the Left and Right.
content.content: 这种VTOL有质量很好的外置炸弹支架,增加了左右两侧安装武器的准确性.

content.original: This hover vehicle has no minimum and maximum movement restrictions even though it's motive type usually does.
content.prevOriginal: This hover vehicle has no minimum and maximum movement restrictions even though it's motive type usually does.
content.content: 这种悬停车辆没有最小和最大运动限制,即使它的机动类型通常会这样.

content.original: Main Battle Tanks are front line fighters, designed to take a pounding and keep on rolling.
content.prevOriginal: Main Battle Tanks are front line fighters, designed to take a pounding and keep on rolling.
content.content: 主战坦克是前线战士,设计用来承受重击并继续运转.

content.original: This unit has integral RF Jammers, IR Flashers, and Laser Dazzlers that function as a ''Soft Kill'' anti-missile system.
content.prevOriginal: This unit has integral RF Jammers, IR Flashers, and Laser Dazzlers that function as a ''Soft Kill'' anti-missile system.
content.content: 该单位具有集成的射频干扰器、红外闪光器和激光眩光器,作为'软杀伤'反导弹系统.

content.original: Wheeled unit moves as if had tracks and was one (1) weight class lighter with respect to terrain.
content.prevOriginal: Wheeled unit moves as if had tracks and was one (1) weight class lighter with respect to terrain.
content.content: 轮式装置的移动就像有履带一样,对于地面来说重量轻了一(1)级.

content.original: This vehicle's weak points and moving parts are protected with angled armor, baffles and collars to mitigate incoming fire that might otherwise jam mechanisms.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle's weak points and moving parts are protected with angled armor, baffles and collars to mitigate incoming fire that might otherwise jam mechanisms.
content.content: 这辆车的弱点和运动部件被倾斜装甲,挡板和前围保护,以减轻即将到来的火力,否则让机械卡壳.
强化结构降低严重损伤率.

content.original: This vehicle accelerates quickly, helping it get the jump on the opposition and allowing it to move further without stressing its engines.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle accelerates quickly, helping it get the jump on the opposition and allowing it to move further without stressing its engines.
content.content: 这辆车加速很快,可以帮助它跳到对手身上,并允许它在不增加引擎压力的情况下进一步前进.

content.original: This unit features enhanced communications equipment allowing the pilots greater control over the tactical situation.
content.prevOriginal: This unit features enhanced communications equipment allowing the pilots greater control over the tactical situation.
content.content: 该单位拥有改进的通讯设备,可以使驾驶员更好的把握战术态势.

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: This vehicle has enhanced equipment for mitigating the dangers of extreme heat, burning liquids and fires.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle has enhanced equipment for mitigating the dangers of extreme heat, burning liquids and fires.
content.content: 这辆车有增强的设备,以弱化灼热、燃烧液体和火灾的危险.

content.original: WIP vehicle quirk for charge perk and/or melee defense.
content.prevOriginal: WIP vehicle quirk for charge perk and/or melee defense.
content.content: WIP车辆特性可以用于冲锋和/或近战防御.

content.original: Guardian ECM making this unit harder to hit.
content.prevOriginal: Guardian ECM making this unit harder to hit.
content.content: 守护者ECM让这个单位更难被命中

content.original: All incoming Melee damage reduced extra Melee Damage.
content.prevOriginal: All incoming Melee damage reduced extra Melee Damage.
content.content: 降低即将来临的近战攻击的额外近战伤害

content.original: The Quicsell Company (also known as the Quicksell Company, Quicsel Company, Quiksell Company, Quickcel Company, Quiccell Company, Quiccel Company, Quikcell Company, Quikcel Company, and briefly The Qwix'ell Company, due to an incredibly complicated corporate structure that has baffled generations of tax auditors) is a military goods manufacturer with branches across the Inner Sphere. Though known throughout the Sphere, their products are notorious for being of low quality. In fact the AFFS doesn't accept Quikscell products into service until a team of technicians have inspected every vehicle. If repairs need to be made, they are made immediately and the AFFS charges the time to Quikscell.
content.prevOriginal: The Quicsell Company (also known as the Quicksell Company, Quicsel Company, Quiksell Company, Quickcel Company, Quiccell Company, Quiccel Company, Quikcell Company, Quikcel Company, and briefly The Qwix'ell Company, due to an incredibly complicated corporate structure that has baffled generations of tax auditors) is a military goods manufacturer with branches across the Inner Sphere. Though known throughout the Sphere, their products are notorious for being of low quality. In fact the AFFS doesn't accept Quikscell products into service until a team of technicians have inspected every vehicle. If repairs need to be made, they are made immediately and the AFFS charges the time to Quikscell.
content.content: Quicsell公司由于其复杂的公司结构,困扰了几代税务审计员,它是一家军用品制造商,内部设有分支机构.他们的产品在整个领域都很出名,但也因其低劣的产品质量而臭名昭著.事实上,在每辆车被技术人员检查好前,AFFS不会接受任何Quicsell产品投入使用.如果需要维修,那就必须立即进行维修,AFFS甚至会因为耗费时间而向Quicsell收取维修费.
强化结构降低严重损伤率.

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.content: 被动:使用单武器攻击时忽略目标的遮蔽和守备状态.

content.original: The low stature or narrow design of this unit makes it more difficult to land an attack.
content.prevOriginal: The low stature or narrow design of this unit makes it more difficult to land an attack.
content.content: 该单位的身形经过缩小和狭窄设计,使其更难被定位和攻击.

content.original: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.prevOriginal: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.content: 对该单位的所有攻击提供惩罚.

content.original: Provides a +2 difficulty to hit bonus.
content.prevOriginal: Provides a +2 difficulty to hit bonus.

content.original: This is a cheap civilian vehicle adapted for skirmishing and recon. It lacks the basic shielding, and EMF dampening standard on modern military vehicles, making it shine like a beacon on mech sensors. However it has a low profile and is extremely nimble.
content.prevOriginal: This is a cheap civilian vehicle adapted for skirmishing and recon. It lacks the basic shielding, and EMF dampening standard on modern military vehicles, making it shine like a beacon on mech sensors. However it has a low profile and is extremely nimble.
content.content: 这是一种廉价的民用车辆,适用于小规模战斗和侦察.它缺乏现代军用车辆的基本屏蔽和EMF阻尼标准,使它像灯塔一样在机甲装备的传感器上发光.然而,它拥有低调和极其灵活的特点.

content.original: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.prevOriginal: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).

content.original: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.prevOriginal: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.content: 对该单位的所有攻击提供惩罚.
强化结构降低严重损伤率.

content.original: This Module allows any vehicle to employ Thermal and Night Vision Modes
content.prevOriginal: This Module allows any vehicle to employ Thermal and Night Vision Modes
content.content: 该模块允许任何车辆使用热视和夜视模式
装甲化移动严重损伤奖励
装甲化移动严重损伤奖励

content.original: Most combat vehicles have three or more sets of wheels per side equipped with rugged run-flat pneumatic tires. Materials have improved but wheels themselves have changed little in thousands of years. There's a reason why ''reinventing the wheel'' is a saying saying to describe things that are a waste of effort. For at least 6000 years the wheel has been the first choice when humans want to make something mobile.
content.prevOriginal: Most combat vehicles have three or more sets of wheels per side equipped with rugged run-flat pneumatic tires. Materials have improved but wheels themselves have changed little in thousands of years. There's a reason why ''reinventing the wheel'' is a saying saying to describe things that are a waste of effort. For at least 6000 years the wheel has been the first choice when humans want to make something mobile.
content.content: 大多数战车每侧有三套或更多的轮子,配有坚固的充气轮胎.材料虽然改进了,但轮子本身几千年来变化很小.'重新发明轮子'是一个用来形容浪费精力的事情的说法,这是有原因的.至少6000年来,轮子一直是人类想要移动的首选.
装甲化移动严重损伤奖励

content.original: Wheeled vehicles are easy to drive, relatively quiet in operation, weight efficient and simple. On the other hand they are worse off road and in rough terrain than tracked vehicles.
content.prevOriginal: Wheeled vehicles are easy to drive, relatively quiet in operation, weight efficient and simple. On the other hand they are worse off road and in rough terrain than tracked vehicles.
content.content: 轮式车辆易于驾驶,操作相对安静,重量效率高且简单.另一方面,它们在公路和崎岖的地形上表现比履带车辆更糟糕.

content.original: Wheels don't make much noise compared to other motive
content.prevOriginal: Wheels don't make much noise compared to other motive
content.content: 与其它驱动方式相比,轮子发出的噪音不大.

content.original: Most combat vehicles have three or more sets of wheels per side equipped with rugged run-flat pneumatic tires. Materials have improved but wheels themselves have changed little in thousands of years. There's a reason why ''reinventing the wheel'' is a saying saying to describe things that are a waste of effort. For at least 6000 years the wheel has been the first choice when humans want to make something mobile.

content.original: Unlike most mechs, the majority of combat vehicles are crewed by more than one individual. Three or four has been the standard for centuries, with the primary roles being Commander, Driver, and Gunner. There may also be loaders, communications operators, engineers and additional gunners. They are generally grouped together into a single so called fighting compartment. Weapons fire that penetrates this compartment can wound or kill the entire crew.
content.prevOriginal: Unlike most mechs, the majority of combat vehicles are crewed by more than one individual. Three or four has been the standard for centuries, with the primary roles being Commander, Driver, and Gunner. There may also be loaders, communications operators, engineers and additional gunners. They are generally grouped together into a single so called fighting compartment. Weapons fire that penetrates this compartment can wound or kill the entire crew.
content.content: 和大多数机甲不同,主战坦克由不止一人驾驶.几个世纪以来,三四个人是一个标准车组,主要有指挥官、驾驶员和炮手.还可能有有工程师、装填手、通讯操作员和其他炮手.他们组成一个所谓的战斗小组.武器火力击穿该舱室可能让整个车组的人员受伤或死亡.

content.original: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Resolve.
content.prevOriginal: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Resolve.
content.content: 为产生决心的活动提供[AMT]奖励.

content.original: Environmental Sealing is a series of filters, air tanks, hermetic seals, and scrubbers that allow a unit to operate in hostile environments like the vacuum of space, under water, or toxic waste dumps. All BattleMechs, AeroSpace and Conventional Fighters, DropShips, and submarine vehicles include environmental sealing as part of their construction. This sealing takes up no additional weight or space as it's built into the unit. Other units, like IndustrialMechs and combat vehicles, can be equipped with environmental sealing at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.prevOriginal: Environmental Sealing is a series of filters, air tanks, hermetic seals, and scrubbers that allow a unit to operate in hostile environments like the vacuum of space, under water, or toxic waste dumps. All BattleMechs, AeroSpace and Conventional Fighters, DropShips, and submarine vehicles include environmental sealing as part of their construction. This sealing takes up no additional weight or space as it's built into the unit. Other units, like IndustrialMechs and combat vehicles, can be equipped with environmental sealing at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.content: 环境密闭是一系列过滤器、气罐、气密密封件和过滤器,能够使单位在恶劣环境中正常运行,如真空、水下或有毒废物倾倒区.所有战斗机甲、LAM、常规战斗机、登陆舰和潜艇都将环境密闭作为其结构的一部分.这种密闭不需要额外的重量或空间,因为它内置在单位中.其他单位.如工业机甲和作战车辆,可以以单位重量的10%的成本配备环境密闭.

content.original: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.prevOriginal: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.content: 默认作战车辆火控系统.火控系统(FCS)协调和分析传感器送来的大量信息,以便追踪单位、生成射击解决方案和攻击目标.

content.original: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.prevOriginal: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.content: 默认作战车辆火控系统.火控系统(FCS)协调和分析传感器送来的大量信息,以便追踪单位、生成射击解决方案和攻击目标.

content.original: Missile weapon attacks have their hit improved by 3.
content.prevOriginal: Missile weapon attacks have their hit improved by 3.

content.original: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.prevOriginal: A default Combat Vehicle FCS. A Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.content: 默认作战车辆火控系统.火控系统(FCS)协调和分析传感器送来的大量信息,以便追踪单位、生成射击解决方案和攻击目标.

content.original: Fully amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.prevOriginal: Fully amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.content: 完全水陆两栖车辆可以在水上漂浮和前进,需要花费单位重量的10%

content.original: Amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.prevOriginal: Amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.content: 完全水陆两栖车辆可以在水上漂浮和前进,需要花费单位重量的10%.

content.original: Fully amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.prevOriginal: Fully amphibious vehicles can float and propel themselves on water at a cost of 10% of the unit's weight.
content.content: 完全水陆两栖车辆可以在水上漂浮和前进,需要花费单位重量的10%

content.original: Crude materials and design dating back to the Age of War or before. Simpler and cheaper, but much heavier than a modern chassis.
content.prevOriginal: Crude materials and design dating back to the Age of War or before. Simpler and cheaper, but much heavier than a modern chassis.
content.content: 原始材料和设计可以追溯到战争时代或更前.更简单、更便宜,但比现代地盘重的多.

content.original: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 基础传感器套件.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 基础传感器套件.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: A vehicle turret is a structure that allows weapons to be aimed and elevated independently of the vehicle's facing. This gives tanks one of their few true advantages over Battlemechs: Easy 360 degree coverage with their main gun(s).
content.prevOriginal: A vehicle turret is a structure that allows weapons to be aimed and elevated independently of the vehicle's facing. This gives tanks one of their few true advantages over Battlemechs: Easy 360 degree coverage with their main gun(s).
content.content: 车辆炮塔是一种允许武器瞄准和发射的结构,与车辆正面无关.这使坦克比机甲有一个真正的优势: 主炮可以覆盖360度.

content.original: The Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was a special type of cybernetic implant developed for the Manei Domini. The system worked in principle similar to the Clans' Enhanced Imaging system, allowing MechWarriors, aerospace fighter pilots, battle armor troopers and even combat vehicle and Small Craft crews to become one with their machines. Unlike the EI system, however, VDNI was able to ward off the short-term negative effects of the technology by employing improved circuit breakers and forcing users to regularly ingest a special chemical agent.
content.prevOriginal: The Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was a special type of cybernetic implant developed for the Manei Domini. The system worked in principle similar to the Clans' Enhanced Imaging system, allowing MechWarriors, aerospace fighter pilots, battle armor troopers and even combat vehicle and Small Craft crews to become one with their machines. Unlike the EI system, however, VDNI was able to ward off the short-term negative effects of the technology by employing improved circuit breakers and forcing users to regularly ingest a special chemical agent.
content.content: 车辆直接神经接口(VDNI)是为Manei Domini开发的一种特殊类型控制植入物.该系统在原理上与氏族增强成像系统类似,允许机甲战士、战斗机驾驶员、战斗装甲兵、甚至是作战车辆和小型艇与他们的机器成为一体.然而与EI系统不同,VDNI是可以通过使用改进断路器强制用户定期摄入特殊化学物质抵御该技术的短期负面影响.

content.original: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.prevOriginal: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).

content.original: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.prevOriginal: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.content: 与现代内燃机的作用和意义相同,BattleTech中的内燃机主要用于常规车辆和工业领域.他的输出功率远小于同重量的聚变发动机,这意味着要输出与聚变发动机相同的功率,内燃机会更重.

content.original: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.prevOriginal: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.content: 燃料电池发动机主要用于轨道系统、个人运输和工业机甲等民间应用.燃料电池发动机产生电力,然后由载具用于操作其推进系统.燃料电池发动机与普通的内燃机相比具有几个优点.虽然它们都需要氧化剂才能运行,但它们可以随时使用储存的氧化剂及燃料,这使其成为潜艇、卫星和海军应用的良好选择.由于大多数燃料电池依靠氢气和氧气运行,它们除了水蒸气之外没有废气,因此燃料电池也被用作建筑物和其他大型结构的发电机.无法使用额外冷却套件、换热器或蓄热器.

content.original: While conventional armor isn't plagued by the heat problems mechs face, they still need cooling for engines and weapons. The components and technology are essentially identical.
content.prevOriginal: While conventional armor isn't plagued by the heat problems mechs face, they still need cooling for engines and weapons. The components and technology are essentially identical.
content.content: 虽然传统装甲车辆不受机甲面临的热量问题的困扰,但它们仍然需要发动机和武器的冷却.组件和技术本质上是相同的.

content.original: Pretty much just a cooling aura for a truck.
content.prevOriginal: Pretty much just a cooling aura for a truck.
content.content: 几乎是一个卡车的冷却范围

content.original: This is a series of cranes and hoists that allow the lifting of units, be they mech, tank, or turret. Airlifted units can take actions while lifted but cannot move in any way while lifted.
content.prevOriginal: This is a series of cranes and hoists that allow the lifting of units, be they mech, tank, or turret. Airlifted units can take actions while lifted but cannot move in any way while lifted.
content.content: 这是一系列起重机和吊车,可以装载单位,无论是机械,坦克,或炮塔.空运单位在升空时可以执行行动,但在升空时不能以任何方式移动.

content.original: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Allows for lifting any unit in the battlefield (up to 100 tons). Hostile units take damage when dropped.
content.prevOriginal: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Allows for lifting any unit in the battlefield (up to 100 tons). Hostile units take damage when dropped.
content.content: 激活能力(用开火动作).可以在战场上举起任何单位(最多100吨).敌对单位掉落时受到伤害.

content.original: A weaponized Microwave dish used for Deep Space Communication. Don't stand in front of the array. It melts more than chocolate bars.
content.prevOriginal: A weaponized Microwave dish used for Deep Space Communication. Don't stand in front of the array. It melts more than chocolate bars.
content.content: 一种用于深空通迅的武器化微波盘.不要站在微波阵列前.否则你比巧克力棒更容易融化.

content.original: A drone Remote Control System set up to deploy a swarm of Sensor Drones.
content.prevOriginal: A drone Remote Control System set up to deploy a swarm of Sensor Drones.
content.content: 一个无人机远程控制系统,用于部署一群传感器无人机.

content.original: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
content.prevOriginal: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
content.content: 主动能力(使用开火动作). 对在旋转的金色圆圈范围内的所有敌人进行传感器锁定.使用后进入冷却状态.

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.prevOriginal: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.content: 增压器允许机甲超出正常发动机输出,以更高的发热为代价增加不行和冲刺的距离.可激活:故障时爆炸! 一些迷信的人认为这会导致感冒.

content.original: This vehicle Infantry Compartment has Firing Ports, allowing carried Battle Armors fire their weapons from inside the vehicle.
content.prevOriginal: This vehicle Infantry Compartment has Firing Ports, allowing carried Battle Armors fire their weapons from inside the vehicle.
content.content: 这辆车的步兵舱有射击孔,可以让携带的战斗装甲从车内开火.

content.original: This is where a Mobile Army Surgical Hospital keeps the wounded people you're gunning down. You monster.
content.prevOriginal: This is where a Mobile Army Surgical Hospital keeps the wounded people you're gunning down. You monster.
content.content: 这一个流动的陆军野战医院,用来收留你攻击的伤员,你是个怪物.

content.original: Crates and crates of small arms munitions, fuel, chemicals and other war materiel. There's always a buyer for such things.
content.prevOriginal: Crates and crates of small arms munitions, fuel, chemicals and other war materiel. There's always a buyer for such things.
content.content: 一箱箱小型武器弹药、燃料、化学品和其他战争物资.这种东西总是有买家的.

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 由卡佩兰联邦开发的隐身装甲相当于星联时代零信号系统.除头部外的每个部位占用1个槽位并且需要ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: Special advanced stealth armor designed for the Red October. There are persistent rumors of its appearance on other advanced units, but these have yet to be confirmed.
content.prevOriginal: Special advanced stealth armor designed for the Red October. There are persistent rumors of its appearance on other advanced units, but these have yet to be confirmed.
content.content: 为红色十月号设计的特殊先进隐身装甲.一直有传言说它会出现在其他先进单位前，但这些还有待证实。

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.prevOriginal: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.content: 增压器允许机甲超出正常发动机输出,以更高的发热为代价增加不行和冲刺的距离.可激活:故障时爆炸! 一些迷信的人认为这会导致感冒.

content.original: The VTOL Jet Booster is a piece of equipment used to increase the speed of any VTOL. The Booster itself has existed in different forms since the time of Early Spaceflight. Its modern versions were separately created by Clan Hell's Horses in 2839, while Cal-Boeing of Dorwinion developed its own in 3009 in the Inner Sphere. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE!
content.prevOriginal: The VTOL Jet Booster is a piece of equipment used to increase the speed of any VTOL. The Booster itself has existed in different forms since the time of Early Spaceflight. Its modern versions were separately created by Clan Hell's Horses in 2839, while Cal-Boeing of Dorwinion developed its own in 3009 in the Inner Sphere. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE!
content.content: 垂直起降(VTOL)喷气助推器是一种用于提高垂直起降速度的设备.在早期航天飞行以来,助推器本身就以不同形式存在.其现代版本分别由"地狱马"氏族与2839年创建和多尔维尼翁的卡尔·波音公司在3009年研制了内天体自己的助推器.可激活:失败时爆炸!

content.original: A VTOL Chin Turret is a small turret mounted underneath the nose of a VTOL. It is identical to a standard vehicle turret except that it does not enable firing directly to the rear.
content.prevOriginal: A VTOL Chin Turret is a small turret mounted underneath the nose of a VTOL. It is identical to a standard vehicle turret except that it does not enable firing directly to the rear.
content.content: VTOL机鼻炮塔是一种安装在VOTL机鼻下面的小型炮塔.它和标准车辆炮塔相同,但不能直接向后射击.

content.original: This is where we stick all the random nuts and bolts that fall off the vehicle while out in the field. And any other cargo.
content.prevOriginal: This is where we stick all the random nuts and bolts that fall off the vehicle while out in the field. And any other cargo.
content.content: 这是我们存放所有从车辆在野外掉落的螺栓和螺母的地方.及其他任何货物.

content.original: CASE is short for Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment. In an internal explosion event, CASE prevents the explosion from traveling to adjacent mech compartments. While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.
content.prevOriginal: CASE is short for Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment. In an internal explosion event, CASE prevents the explosion from traveling to adjacent mech compartments. While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.
content.content: CASE是蜂窝弹药存储设备的缩写.在内部爆炸中,CASE防止爆炸蔓延到相邻的机甲舱室.虽然CASE不能阻止保护部位内的损坏,但它可以阻止爆炸冲击波穿过它,这有助于防止弹药爆炸波及机甲的手臂和核心躯干.

content.original: CASE is short for Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment. In an internal explosion event, CASE prevents the explosion from traveling to adjacent mech compartments. While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.

While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.

content.prevOriginal: Expanded Communications equipment improves lance coordination and effectiveness.
content.content: 拓展通迅设备提高了小队的协调性和效率.

content.original: Non-Functional. Does not carry Battle Armor. This is where Conventional infantry rides, if and when we get infantry. It reduces crit chance to represent the dead space in the vehicle where there's nothing vital to hit.
content.prevOriginal: Non-Functional. Does not carry Battle Armor. This is where Conventional infantry rides, if and when we get infantry. It reduces crit chance to represent the dead space in the vehicle where there's nothing vital to hit.
content.content: 无功能,它不携带战斗装甲.这是常规步兵乘坐的地方,如果我们有步兵的话,它会降低严重损伤率,以表示载具中没有致命的关键区域.

content.original:
This compartment is configured for carrying Battle Armored infantry into combat. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 1 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.prevOriginal:
This compartment is configured for carrying Battle Armored infantry into combat. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 1 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.content:
这种隔间是为携带战斗装甲进入战斗而配置. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>可以携带1战斗装甲小队</color>

This compartment is configured for carrying Battle Armored infantry into combat. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 2 Battle Armor Squads</color>
